# webPlugInStop()

**Instance Method**

Tells the plug-in to stop normal operation.

## Declaration

```swift
func webPlugInStop()
```

## Discussion

This method may be called more than once, provided that the application has already called [doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObject-swift.class/webPlugInInitialize()] and that each call to this method is preceded by a call to [doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObject-swift.class/webPlugInStart()].

## Controlling the Plug-in

- **webPlugInDestroy()**: Prepares the plug-in for deallocation.
- **webPlugInInitialize()**: Initializes the plug-in.
- **webPlugInStart()**: Tells the plug-in to start normal operation.
